channel.title: Post prefix
channel.description:
Maybe you should add a post prefix in the help section.
[PI] [DELTA] [CZAR]
or frames?
317 508 etc

item.title: Post prefix
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Maybe revision, but we need something there

Read full topic

item.title: Post prefix
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:15, topic:374138”][quote author=rash link=topic=470127.msg3438266#msg3438266 date=1292923965]
Why revision?

If the prefix is [DELTA], i hope your not going to think its 508
[/quote]

Revision seems a much more logical choice.[/quote]

Second.

Read full topic

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

item.title: Post prefix
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:17, topic:374138”][quote author=rash link=topic=470127.msg3438275#msg3438275 date=1292924434]

Why revision?

If the prefix is [DELTA], i hope your not going to think its 508

Revision seems a much more logical choice.

Reasoning?
[/quote]Because some people know more about certain revisions than others, and if you support different revisions, you can support all the different bases. However, if you support specific bases, you might leave out some of the smaller ones.[/quote]

Good point

Read full topic

item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

item.title: Post prefix
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“flj0yter0p, post:9, topic:374138”]There was a mod for SMF some warez forums use for threads containing links to either rapidshare, megaupload and that other one…

Can’t seem to remember but i think it puts either an icon or auto [##] to name. You could chose the type while making the thread by some lil scroll menu or something.[/quote]

Exactly that.

[quote=“I Vain I”]I believe this is a good idea to have the server base post prefix.

Though, the revision may be tricky.
There are plenty of servers out there that are custom revisions that nobody else has, and some with revisions like others. Such as, there could be two 317 bases, but different structure, so the post prefix would be required.

Or, there could be a 218 server, which not many people use.

I know revision is more along the lines of client, but different revisions can also denote different methods, languages, package setup and more.

They are both wonderful ideas, but can be bad at certain times.[/quote]
It can be, but would also be very helpful to those browsing the help forum.

Davidi2:

I don’t understand what this is? Is it like a dropdown menu in the new post area where you choose the prefix, then it automatically appends it to the title? Or what…

You have it right.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:13, topic:374138”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=470127.msg3437734#msg3437734 date=1292884644]
I don’t understand what this is? Is it like a dropdown menu in the new post area where you choose the prefix, then it automatically appends it to the title? Or what…

[/quote]
Guessing so, if this happened though, it would need to be revision prefix’s, not base.[/quote]

Why revision?

If the prefix is [DELTA], i hope your not going to think its 508

Read full topic
